title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The bug report does not provide enough information about the issue. Please provide more details on what specifically is wrong with the usage of Class.forName() in BidiUtil in win32.
EB: The bug report should include a clear explanation of the expected behavior and the actual behavior observed. Additionally, the steps to reproduce the issue should be provided.
SR: The suggested code change is unclear and lacks context. Please provide a complete and clear solution for the bug.
